articles.title: Amid 32 FIRs, 44 arrests in Goa ‘cash-for-jobs’ scam, CM Sawant faces Cong, AAP firestorm
articles.description: An alleged multi-crore “cash-for-jobs” scam is putting the heat on the BJP government in Goa. The state Opposition has been alleging the involvement of the ruling BJP dispensation in the scam, claiming that “government jobs were on sale” in the state. The Congress, AAP and Goa Forward Party, have called for an inquiry by a judicial […]
articles.content:
After long tussle, why Bhagwant Mann govt is offering an olive branch to Centre

articles.title: Nature-Based Solutions Could Create 32 Million Jobs by 2030, Report Reveals
articles.description: New ILO, IUCN, and UNEP Report Highlights Economic and Environmental Potential of NbS Investments.
articles.content: Investing in nature-based solutions (NbS) could generate up to 32 million jobs worldwide by 2030, according to a report launched during the 16th session of the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD) Conference of the Parties (COP... [3897 chars]

articles.title: Govt committed to providing school education to every section of society: PM Modi
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday said his government has taken another big decision to make school education as accessible as possible with the Cabinet approving the opening of 85 new Kendriya Vidyalayas.He asserted that while the step will benefit a large number of students, many new employment opportunities will also be created.

articles.title: Check and verify documents of candidates selected for govt jobs in 6 months: SC to police
articles.description: In an order passed on December 5, a bench of Justices J K Maheshwari and R Mahadevan said appointments to government posts would have to be regularised only after verification of the credentials of the candidates.
articles.content: The Supreme Court has directed police officials of all the state governments to check and verify documents pertaining to the character, antecedents, nationality, genuineness produced by the candidates selected for government jobs within six months fr... [2358 chars]

articles.title: Usha Uthup on staying away from politics, hunger for acting jobs: ‘I can be a vada-pav wali, bootlegger, servant, I just don’t want to be me’
articles.description: India's beloved pop icon, Usha Uthup, shares a glimpse into her pre-show prep and the significance of her cherished daily ritual - the transformative art of shringaar that includes her Kanjeevaram sarees, gajras, bangles and bindis.
articles.content: At 77, the inimitable Usha Uthup is poised to electrify the stage at this month’s NH7 Weekender in Pune. In a candid conversation with SCREEN, the pop legend shared the secrets of her pre-concert preparations, her deliberate distance from politics an... [4677 chars]

articles.title: Over 50% IIT Delhi graduates secured campus placements this year: Survey
articles.description: Students availing on-campus placement in 2023-24 had increased by about 25 per cent from 2022-23, which includes a six-fold increase in the number of PhD scholars.
articles.content: More than half of graduating students from the Indian Institute of Technology Delhi (IIT Delhi) secured job offers through on-campus recruitment programmes, while around 10 per cent were self-employed or ventured into entrepreneurship, and 1.7 per ce... [701 chars]

articles.title: Wall St Week Ahead-Inflation report poses test for stocks rally as Fed meeting looms
articles.description: Following the jobs data, there is a "higher bar" for the upcoming consumer price report to pause any planned rate cut at the Fed's next meeting, said Molly McGown, U.S. rates strategist at TD Securities. The consumer price index is expected to have climbed 2.7% for the 12 months through November, according to Reuters data.
articles.content:
An inflation report in the coming week will test the strength of the record-setting U.S. stocks rally and provide a crucial piece of data that could factor into the Federal Reserve's plans for rate cuts.
The S&P 500 on Friday was on pace for its thir... [3448 chars]

articles.title: Startup jobs data 2024: After IT, these startups created the most direct jobs in India
articles.description: Startup India initiative data reveals that startups created almost 16.7 lakh direct jobs across 55 industries in the country as of October-end, including agriculture, healthcare, and more
articles.content:
Health and life sciences startups were the top direct job providers after the IT services sector, accounting for almost 9 per cent of the total jobs provided by registered Indian startup firms.
The official government data under the Startup India ini... [1419 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 2-STOXX closes up; French stocks outperform on expectations of new budget
articles.description: European shares eked out gains on Friday, with French stocks logging their biggest daily rise in three weeks as investors factored in a potential budget despite ongoing political uncertainty, while also parsing an upbeat U.S. jobs report. The pan-European STOXX 600 was up 0.1%, logging its seventh consecutive day in advances and its strongest weekly performance in ten.
